notes:
Chat Video Pro V3.0.5 brings smarter AI, new video models, and enhanced memory.

• GPT 5.2 Upgrade — Both fast and thinking versions now available with better performance, intelligence, and larger context window.
• Enhanced Memory System — Improved memory facts and session memory for better conversation continuity.
• Grok Imagine (NEW) — Complete new model family with text-to-image, image-to-image, text-to-video, image-to-video, and video-to-video.
• Story Cutter Enhancements — Now reviews your edits with feedback, scoring, and cut recommendations.
• Faster Chat Startup — All conversation starters instantly load on new chat creation.
